Plan A
1.方案1 无参数初始化
Letter accuracy: 0.32285471537807986(1140/3531)
Structure accuracy: 0.932(1165/1250)
Total accuracy: 0.4821167119849404(2305/4781)
2.方案2 kaiming初始化
Letter accuracy: 0.3276692155196828(1157/3531)
Structure accuracy: 0.9384(1173/1250)
Total accuracy: 0.48734574356829113(2330/4781)
Editing distance: 0.5893351352098928
